message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $140. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
I'm really interested in the product, but $140 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $90 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $130. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair price.
I'm still interested in the product, but $130 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
